Spread over approx. 11000 sq. ft., Patel Hospital is equipped with world-class infrastructure and the latest medical technology. From robotics to super-specialized surgeries, state-of-the-art diagnostic facilities to best-in-region intensive care, here you can get access to a comprehensive range of full medical services and surgical options.
overview.title: JALANDHAR'S PRIDE IN HEALTHCARE
overview.description:
Patel Hospital is a leading multispecialty healthcare centre in Punjab, ideally located in the heart of Jalandhar. Known for providing the best of healthcare and hospitality, Patel Hospital is equipped with the latest medical technology and world-class infrastructure, spread over 150,000 sq. ft. From robotics to super-specialized surgeries, state-of-the-art diagnostic facilities to best-in-region intensive care, we offer a comprehensive range of full medical services and surgical options.

Motivated by our core values of selfless service and enriched by our decades of rich experience, we stand today as Jalandhar's pride in healthcare and the leaders of medical excellence in the region.
overview.quote: Patel Hospital's working ethos is driven by the future and firmly rooted in our rich heritage and values.

our_story.story_title: A LEGACY OF 50 YEARS OF EXCELLENCE
our_story.story_desc: Our story starts in Jalandhar in 1974, with two noble doctors and their vision of greatness, guided by the inspiring principles of the Iron Man of India.
our_story.story_quote: There is something unique in this soil, which despite many obstacles has always remained the abode of great souls.
story_big_desc: Dr B.S. Chopra and Dr S.K. Sharma wanted to create a medical institute that would one day become a leading multispecialty hospital. Committed to the core Indian values of selfless care and customer delight, they simultaneously sought to bring the highest standards of expertise and medical excellence to their community.

Built from the bottom up by two visionary desi boys on a mission, Patel Hospital has grown up from the soil to become a renowned centre of medical excellence, equal to meet every healthcare need with world-class treatment. Our founding doctors' unique vision, dedication, and medical skills guided Patel Hospital to the heights it has achieved today.

From 20 beds to 250+ beds, from a small hospital in Jalandhar to a leading multispecialty medical centre in North West India, it has indeed been a journey of greatness. Proving that where integrity and patient care are prioritized, excellence will follow!

Over the years, as technology evolved at a dizzying pace and medical innovations transformed the arena of medicine, Patel Hospital stayed abreast of the latest trends, always striving to deliver world-class medicine to patients.
our_story.story_quote2: With our motto of patient care first, above all, we knew it was imperative that Patel Hospital evolved with the times to offer the best of medical care. Today, we are proud to stand as leaders in medical innovation and technological expertise of the region!
our_story.story_quote2_conclusion: Patel Hospital provides international-level infrastructure, the latest technology, and cutting-edge procedures for a vast range of specialties. Whether you are looking for a routine health check-up, diagnostic services, consultation, specialized expertise, world-class surgical options, or the latest medical technology, at Patel Hospital, we offer it all. With us, you are in the trusted hands of top class medical experts, committed to providing you with the most efficient, dedicated, and caring patient experience.
our_story.heading2: HOW A BLESSING BECAME A LEGACY
our_story.desc2:
Our beloved slogan, an inspiring message speaking to the essence of our practice, is much more than a merely catchy line.

The story goes back 50 years. On the occasion of establishing a new hospital venture, Pandit Apte, one of India's respected freedom fighters and a disciple of Mahatma Gandhi, was invited to provide his counsel and blessings. Apteji then uttered the deep thought that went on to become our tagline.
our_story.quote3:
'As you are starting a hospital, to serve the sick and ailing, I will not say 'May you have many customers' as one would for most new businesses. Instead, I will say
'Jo Aave, So Raazi Jaave!'
Let whomsoever comes here, be treated with the utmost care and leave with the greatest satisfaction for the services received.'

our_ethos.our_mission_quote: Our mission is to bring alive our motto of “Jo Aave So Raazi Jaave” in everything we do.
our_ethos.our_mission_desc:
We place our patients at the heart of everything we do, providing unparalleled service with respect and care.

At Patel, everyone matters. We welcome and care for patients from all backgrounds.

We strive to give every person associated with Patel Hospital an extraordinary experience, distinguished by our unique touch of Indian hospitality and international level care.
our_ethos.our_mission_quote2: 'As I waited for my results, one nurse just sat with me and spoke to me so I didn't feel alone. It was very reassuring.'
our_ethos.our_vision_quote: "Integrity, innovation, customer care: yesterday, today, tomorrow, forever!"
our_ethos.our_vision_desc: To be the hospital of choice for every customer; patients must always choose us for our expertise, our world-class infrastructure and latest technology, and our unparalleled commitment to patient care. To become a leading network of hospitals, ensuring access to superior healthcare for all those within our operational regions through our culture of innovation and international-standard centers of excellence. To be a great place to work with a culture of fostering integrity and excellence, to attract the best talent, and to be the employer of choice.
